Articles.Content: While I was use a 4K screen and set Windows 11 to 4K resolution， adjust the resolution in game setting resulted in black screen and then the game crashed. I can still see KSP2 in the taskbar, but I can't open the window then  the game crash. After I changed Windows setting into 2K resolution, the problem gone.

Here's the log:
